resource.descriptor: Form: (Module Nurse & Doctor Duty) - Nurse & Doctor Duty
Form: (Module Active Patients) - Record Notes & Flags
Form: (Module Educational Extras) - Education Extras: Labour Videos

xpath.function: if($next_pv = 0, 'Next PV exam due now', if($next_pv < 0, concat('Next PV exam late by ', $next_pv_string, ''), concat('Time until next PV exam: ', $next_pv_string)))
if($next_exam = 0, 'Next exam due now', if($next_exam < 0, concat('Next exam late by ', $next_exam_string, ''), concat('Time until next exam: ', $next_exam_string)))
